content.raw:
it looks like the phantom 1.0.0 release was in the following release repo:

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs1-release/src/3658c75b563cc947d501294cfd3caee8b53fb36d/xenial/debian/changelog?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default

but the prerelease have come from

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs-release/src/818cb2c20e6deccecfa7794766191ca1b47cc2e6/xenial/debian/changelog?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default

I'll probably use ign-msgs-release and maybe we can delete ign-msgs1-release? I think that's what @\_jrivero_  usually does
